ProductInfo.Features:
An attractive quad-core 3G smartphone with high performance, stylish design and reasonable price
Adopt Android 4.2 OS, and is powered by MTK6589 Cortex-A7 Quad-core 1.2GHz CPU, PowerVR SGX544 MP2 GPU and 1GB RAM to ensure its running more stably
Support dual SIM card dual standby, and is compatible with Tri-band GSM and WCDMA 3G networks for making phone calls
Support WiFi and built-in WCDMA 3G networks for surfing internet, and also supports wireless Bluetooth for data transmission and hands-free calling
A 3.0MP front camera for self capturing and enjoying online video chat, and a 5.0MP back camera with auto focus for shooting interesting things and moments
ProductInfo.Name: Foxnovo Amoi N850 MTK6589 Quad-core Android 4.2 4.5-inch QHD IPS Screen Dual-camera GPS 1GB/4GB 3G Smartphone (Grey)
